3.sentence: "Kill yourself already, you stupid pussy!" - That's what I hear online, the trolls come out in force when you show any weakness or even just be yourself and be honest about what it's like. I am so fed up with this!:!:!:! Grhhrahrhahhrh I hate this stuff, why does it happen to me?
